players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to analyze who benefits from silencing him. Let's share our thoughts openly."
You: "I agree, Diana. Charlie's death is a huge loss for the town. We should all share any suspicions or observations we have."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out immediately."
Bob: "Alice, you're the mafioso and we all know it now. There's no point in trying to defend yourself - the evidence is clear."
You: "I am the detective, Bob is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso."

Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of the more suspicious Charlie? Alice, if you're the detective, why investigate me when Charlie was the obvious threat? One of you is lying."
